name: Whiskun 100 retsuken
description:
This is the fighting game on Oculus Rift DK2 w/Leap Motion VR mount.

Whiskun - a stuffed animal with yellow ears - is in the VR world.

Hit the Black Waru-Whiskun by your hand (w/stone shape), and save the Yellow Whiskun by your hand (w/paper shape).

(Updated Dec.14/2014 - Enabled the High-score function.)
